text:
Hello guys! How are you!

Im getting an issue with a custom module, that work's pretty well at the website home page. But it doens't works on inner pages using even the same templates and characteristics

I'm leaving attatched two photos, the first one you can see that it shows well at the second one, everything is full sized not processing the styles.

Does anyone have had this issue?
Seems to be a CSS topic. Do you have the styles in the module.css or in a seperate CSS like slider.css or theme.css?

I have a question. In HubSpot, there is an option called "case study." How is it used? Also, if we publish case studies as blog posts, can we display the first 3 case studies on a webpage? Can we make it similar to an RSS listing for blogs?
